question: IIT Kharagpur in association with which technology major has developed an Industry 4.0 solution for remotely controlled factory operations ?
explanation:
IIT Kharagpur and Tata Consultancy Services (TCS) have jointly developed a technology for remotely controlled factory operations. This is an Industry 4.0 solution that enables real-time quality correction during industrial production.
The project was supported by the Department of Heavy Industries. Through this development, IIT Kharagpur aims to stimulate innovation in advanced manufacturing to boost the capital goods sector.
